data.text: It takes so little and means so much and creates an instant loyal customer- #foodallergy is a legitimate medical condition -#gratitude to @delta for #kindness and respect -32 million in US alone with food allergies plus friends/family who #travel with them 👇 https://t.co/kfSkI9tH3u

data.text: @NoNutTraveler @Delta Preboarding, announcements, buffer zones, and regular attendant check-ins, including “Are these other snack products okay? Do you have an Epi-pen?” on all Delta legs this week!

data.text: As I keep saying #travelers with #foodallergies are loyal &  repeat customers in a world full of choices- @Delta seems to have their finger on the pulse of the #foodallergy #consumer and realize we are an asset not a liability !!! other  IMHO:#airlines need to flip the narrative https://t.co/m9z3CgRTIr

urls.title: Urgent Food Allergy and Airline Survey
urls.description: This is our opportunity to make a difference in airline travel. Your Voice and Airline Experience with Food Allergies is needed NOW! Your ten minutes to complete this survey may help millions worldwide who rely on air travel for work, family, and holidays. I have been working with The Center for Food Allergy and Asthma Research (CFAAR) at Northwestern University to create a survey that will gather data that helps policymakers make air travel safer for people living with food allergies. As you know, I've

data.text: @katensign @Delta https://t.co/wLzOiBO59e also please take the survey
